aboutIntro: InvApp is a tool designed for modern investors who want to identify undervalued stocks using principles inspired by Peter Lynch's legendary investment strategies.
aboutMissionText: To make value investing simple, accessible, and intuitive for everyone – from beginners to experienced investors.
aboutHowText: I analyze company fundamentals, simulate Lynch's screening methods, and present user-friendly insights into stock value, growth potential, and history.
aboutTeamText: Built by passionate developer and financial enthusiast, InvApp is an open-source project evolving through user feedback and continuous innovation.

main.title: Welcome to InvApp
main.subtitle: Discover undervalued stocks based on Peter Lynch's strategy.

homeHero.description: This app helps investors select undervalued stocks inspired by Peter Lynch's approach.
homeHero.notes: These are mostly small-cap companies with high growth potential. The list is sorted by increasing undervaluation based on P/E.
homeHero.frontendOnly: This is the front-end version and works exclusively with public APIs. To unlock the full potential, use the version with a connected back end.
